feed.title: [PULL] Add scriptPubKey enforced sendescrow and redeemescrow API calls

entry.title: [PULL] Add scriptPubKey enforced sendescrow and redeemescrow API calls
entry.summary: In a conversation, it was suggested not to use the word 'escrow' while referring to multisig transactions as it is only one of its use cases. The suggestion was to use terms like 'multisign' or 'multipay' transactions instead.
